detailsPage.interCategoryErrorMessage: You can only compare products from the same category.
detailsPage.duplicateProductErrorMessage: This product is already on the comparison page.
detailsPage.autopilotErrorMessage: Please select two to three devices to compare!

tooltips.design: Details about the device's physical characteristics.
tooltips.display: Insights into the device's display quality and size.
tooltips.camera: An overview of the camera's capabilities.
tooltips.inside: Detailed information about the device's internal hardware.
tooltips.technology: Information about core specs, clock speeds, and software compatibility.
tooltips.connectors: The types and number of input/output ports available.
tooltips.memory: Information about memory size, type, and speed.
tooltips.power: Data on power usage and maximum operating temperatures.
tooltips.performance: Details about fill rates, compute power, and other performance metrics.
tooltips.autopilotButton: Engage 'Autopilot' to automatically compare devices side-by-side. Powered by AI, Autopilot thoroughly assesses the specifications, strengths, and weaknesses of each device, and provides a detailed yet easy-to-understand summary of key differences.
